Description.Text:
Position Perfect for families, the hotel Brigantino of Porto Recanati is situated directly onto the sea, the ideal to spend a relaxing and comfortable holiday on the Marche coast.
Restaurant A rich breakfast buffet. The restaurant is open on Sundays only for lunch for the following periods: 01/01 - 31/05, 15/09 - 31/12.
Outside
Lobby Furthermore, at the reception you will find a welcoming and friendly staff ready to give you useful information and advises.
More Informations The hotel Brigantino offers several facilities such as a wonderful swimming pool, an equipped private beach, a bar, an excellent restaurant and two meeting rooms. Beach service with payment; sun umbrella € 3.50 and deck chairs € 4.00 to be paid on spot.
Check in: from 12.00 (midday).
